snippet: Five people went out on the choppy waters of Jamaica Bay in a 13- to 14-foot pleasure boat on Friday.
abstract: Several people are rescued after boat capsizes in Jamaica Bay during period of heavy wind and rain; two are reported to be seriously injured.
lead_paragraph: Five people went out on the choppy waters of Jamaica Bay in a 13- to 14-foot pleasure boat on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Several Are Rescued After Boat Capsizes in Bay
headline.main: Several Are Rescued After Boat Capsizes in Jamaica Bay
